cta.learn_more: Learn to confidently pass interviews and work on international projects

path_section.title: Your path to confident English at Nova English

challenges.missed_opportunities: You miss interesting projects and promotions, which go to those who know English
challenges.slow_reaction: You can't keep up in dialogues or express your thoughts clearly
challenges.constant_dissatisfaction: Constant dissatisfaction and lack of self-confidence
challenges.no_participation: You can't fully participate in important discussions
challenges.no_promotion: You can't move to a higher grade

benefits.advanced_communication: Advanced communication in a professional environment
benefits.native_phrases: Phrases used by native speakers in conversation

audience.it_specialists: IT specialists aiming for career growth

description.it_advantage: Enhance your competitive edge and efficiency, open up more opportunities for learning and collaboration, and participate in international projects.
description.manager_communication: Effectively communicate with international partners, clients, and team members.
description.freelancer_skills: Improve your communication skills and expand your client base, ensuring more successful project completions.
description.junior_opportunities: Unlock access to global resources, fresh ideas, and job opportunities. Strengthen your profile and increase your competitiveness in the job market.

philosophy.no_useless_phrases: Textbooks with grammar and lots of useless phrases? You are no longer in school, and you know which English you need. Now, the focus is only on relevant information
philosophy.remember_phrases: Don't just write down phrases in a notebook, but really remember them. There's a simple method for that, and a bit of discipline!

ilya.experience: Works with American and British IT companies

natali.name: Natali
natali.description: 7 years of experience teaching English in various IT companies
natali.experience: Knows several languages, has successful experience preparing for interviews

features.no_worries: Don't worry: the level of communication is adapted to each level so that even beginners can understand the teacher
features.interactive_situations: Interactive online lessons simulating real situations in IT projects
features.teachers_experience: Our teachers have extensive experience working on projects in the USA and UK

intro.description: Test your English knowledge by taking the test
intro.benefits: Our test will help determine your level and choose a course that best suits your needs

steps.take_the_test: Take the test, which takes about 10 minutes
steps.get_instant_result: Get an instant result with your level assessment
steps.course_recommendation: Based on the results, we will recommend a course that will help you achieve your English learning goals

cta.test_now: Test your knowledge right now and become more competitive in the IT world!

form.title: How to join the course?
form.description: It's simple. Fill out the form below, and we'll contact you via Telegram or another method. We'll discuss all the organizational issues, reserve a spot, and add you to the group channel.

motivation.english_only: Pure English learning. You have no backup, you'll have to communicate in English. But you will definitely manage!
motivation.salary_report: According to Pearson, employees who speak English as a second language earn 25-35% more than those who don't
